H0.text: Measuring from the closest point of each of these countries to the equator, which is the furthest from the equator. Russia

H1.text: Measuring from the closest point of each of these countries to the equator, which is the furthest from the equator. Greenland

H2.text: Measuring from the closest point of each of these countries to the equator, which is the furthest from the equator. Iceland

H3.text: Measuring from the closest point of each of these countries to the equator, which is the furthest from the equator. ᑲᓇᑕ

A4.text: Greenland lies between latitudes 59° and 83°N, with its southernmost point at 59°N.
